Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary decision to assign a worker to a team

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary decision to include a feature in a release plan

Name: allocate_budget_to_project
Description: Amount of budget allocated to a project

Name: set_sprint_velocity
Description: The target velocity for a team in a sprint

Name: assign_story_points
Description: The number of story points assigned to a user story

Name: set_worker_availability
Description: The percentage availability of a worker

Name: set_task_effort
Description: The effort in hours required for a task

Name: set_feature_priority
Description: The priority level assigned to a feature

Name: set_blocker_severity
Description: The severity level of a identified blocker

Name: set_sprint_goal_status
Description: Binary status of whether the sprint goal was met
